title: Yellow Apatite Crystal - Crystal Vaults
author: Katrina Farmer
description: Talismans or Amulet: Apatite is a Seeker Buffer Crystal. Seeker Buffer crystals are used when one seeks to recenter themselves and to find a place of repose, and a place of balance. When your life is out of sorts, and demands are coming in from all directions, you can be pushed far away from where you want to be. Use a Seeker Buffer crystal to insulate yourself from external demands, temper shocks, and add some emotional padding to your daily life. Apatite which is gold in color is the natural birthstone color of those born in the magical month of midsummer (July 22 - August 21). Gold crystals bring you success, enthusiasm, happiness, and power. Color Energy: Yellow Apatite brings the power to solidify new interests and new relationships, helping you to see things in a different light. It adds clarity, waking things up and adding zest, optimism, and meaning to your life and relationships. Light Yellow crystals ensure that new relationships get off to a good start by aiding in the establishment of good communication. They help you focus on the needs of the person or group you are getting to know. Dark Yellow Apatite is an excellent aid when decisiveness, precision, or persuasiveness is needed. Healing: Yellow Apatite activates the Solar Plexus Chakra, the energy distribution center and the chakra of relationships. This chakra is located between the ribcage and navel, and controls the immune and digestive systems. When in balance physically, you have strength to fight infections, are free of allergic reactions, and are able to use the nutrients you ingest. When the solar plexus is out of balance spiritually, you feel fear - of the disappointment or displeasure of others or to subordinating your life and pleasures to the will of others. Spiritually, when the solar plexus is in balance you are free to interpret the world through your own thoughts and emotions and not live in fear of violating the dictums of others. Goddess: Yellow Apatite honors Persephone, Greek Goddess of Spring. She represents celebration and the Earth alive with new growth. Yellow Apatite honors Gaia, the Greek Earth Mother Goddess. Born directly out of Chaos, the primal emptiness, she was the first (or one of the first) beings to appear during the process of creation, and is honored as being the Earth itself. Feng Shui: Yellow Apatite utilizes Fire energy, the energy of enthusiasm, warmth, brightness, illumination and activity. It is Yang in nature. It is the energy of heat, action, emotion and passion - of ideas, of concepts, and sex. It is traditionally associated with the south area of a home or room, and with the fame and reputation area of your dwelling. Use its energy to give your life the boost it needs to enhance your standing in the community and within your family. Meditation: Apatite crystals help focus and enhance our early efforts to seek wisdom, lighting our path to understanding. Other Information: Other practitioners report Apatite is used to make one's visions a reality. Robert Simmons in "The Book of Stones" reports it stimulates the Solar Plexus Chakra and that it replenishes one's energy by establishing a connection between your heart and the energy of the Earth. Marguerite Elsbeth in "Crystal Medicine" reports it is a "Mind over Matter" stone that can help you make things happen. In "Love is in the Earth" Melody reports it to be excellent for achieving deeper states of meditation. She also notes it enhances creativity. In "The Illustrated Directory of Healing Crystals" Cassandra Eason tells us Apatite will calm fears and should be used in all "Earth Aware" rituals. She also finds it an excellent meditation aid. In "101 Power Crystals," Judy Hall tells us calcium rich Apatite is legendary crystal that might well slow the aging process.
